尋找朋友.name: Call for Friends
尋找朋友.description: Search your deck for a Grass-type Pokémon and put it into your hand.

芳香催眠.name: Aromatic Hypnosis
芳香催眠.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

毒粉.name: Poison Powder
毒粉.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

熱帶揮擊.name: Tropical Swing
熱帶揮擊.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

雙重角擊.name: Double Horn Attack
雙重角擊.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

綠葉供給.name: Leaf Supply
綠葉供給.description: Attach a Grass Energy from your discard pile to one of your Benched Grass-type Pokémon.

偷襲.name: Sneak Attack
偷襲.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

火花.name: Ember
火花.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

火焰漩渦.name: Fire Spin
火焰漩渦.description: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

紅蓮風暴.name: Crimson Storm
紅蓮風暴.description: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

搖尾巴.name: Tail Whip
搖尾巴.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't use any attacks during your opponent's next turn.

噴射火焰.name: Flamethrower
噴射火焰.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

熱力衝撞.name: Heat Crash
熱力衝撞.description: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

猛火衝刺.name: Blaze Dash
猛火衝刺.description: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

烈火之舞.name: Fiery Dance
烈火之舞.description: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, attach a Fire Energy from your discard pile to your Benched Fire-type Pokémon in any way you like.

大字爆炎.name: Fire Blast
大字爆炎.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

水砲.name: Hydro Pump
水砲.description: If you have 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

衝浪.name: Surf
衝浪.description: Discard a Water Energy from this Pokémon.

水箭炮.name: Water Cannon
水箭炮.description: If you have 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

頭痛.name: Headache
頭痛.description: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play Supporter cards from their hand.

毒之觸手.name: Poison Tentacles
毒之觸手.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

必殺蟹鉗.name: Guillotine Claw
必殺蟹鉗.description: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

水箭.name: Water Arrow
水箭.description: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

角刺.name: Horn Jab
角刺.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

破壞死光.name: Hyper Beam
破壞死光.description: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

水炮.name: Hydro Cannon
水炮.description: If you have 3 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

古代潮旋.name: Ancient Whirlpool
古代潮旋.description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't use any attacks.

冰凍光束.name: Ice Beam
冰凍光束.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

暴風雪.name: Blizzard
暴風雪.description: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

攻擊傷口.name: Wound Attack
攻擊傷口.description: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

細雪.name: Powder Snow
細雪.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

十萬伏特.name: Thunderbolt
十萬伏特.description: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

電氣陣.name: Electric Field
電氣陣.description: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Lightning Pokémon.

電擊拳.name: Thunder Punch
電擊拳.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon takes 20 damage.

飛彈針.name: Pin Missile
飛彈針.description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

颶風雷電.name: Hurricane Thunder
颶風雷電.description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

落雷.name: Lightning Strike
落雷.description: One of your Benched Pokémon also takes 30 damage.

雷電箭.name: Thunder Javelin
雷電箭.description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

雷電牙.name: Thunder Fang
雷電牙.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

電光一閃.name: Quick Attack
電光一閃.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

電擊.name: Thunder Shock
電擊.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

瞬間移動.name: Teleport
瞬間移動.description: Switch this Pokémon with one of your Benched Pokémon.

精神強念.name: Psychic
精神強念.description: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

屏障攻擊.name: Barrier Attack
屏障攻擊.description: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks.

精神傳達.name: Psychic Exchange
精神傳達.description: Look at all of your opponent's face-down prize cards.

找麻煩.name: Cause Trouble
找麻煩.description: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play Supporter cards from their hand.

力量爆破.name: Power Blast
力量爆破.description: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

精神衝鋒.name: Psychic Assault
精神衝鋒.description: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

雙重金勾臂.name: Double Iron Bash
雙重金勾臂.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage times the number of heads.

精神強念20.name: Psychic
精神強念20.description: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

挖洞.name: Dig
挖洞.description: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

還擊.name: Revenge
還擊.description: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

捨身衝撞.name: Double-Edge
捨身衝撞.description: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

叫聲.name: Growl
叫聲.description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks do 20 less damage.

骨頭迴力鏢.name: Bonemerang
骨頭迴力鏢.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

伸腿踢.name: Stretch Kick
伸腿踢.description: This attack does 30 damage to one of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

甲殼攻擊.name: Shell Attack
甲殼攻擊.description: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

吸血.name: Leech Life
吸血.description: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

揍飛.name: Blow Away
揍飛.description: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with one of their Benched Pokémon. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

窮追不捨.name: Pursuit
窮追不捨.description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

呼朋引伴.name: Call for Family
呼朋引伴.description: Search your deck for a Nidoran♀ and put it onto your Bench.

甜蜜攻擊.name: Sweet Attack
甜蜜攻擊.description: This attack does 50 more damage times the number of Nidoqueen on your Bench.

毒角.name: Poison Horn
毒角.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

毒瓦斯.name: Poison Gas
毒瓦斯.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

毒液衝擊.name: Venom Shock
毒液衝擊.description: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

咬碎.name: Crunch
咬碎.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

聚積.name: Amass
聚積.description: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy and attach it to this Pokémon.

流星群.name: Meteor Shower
流星群.description: Randomly select your opponent's Pokémon 4 times. Each selected Pokémon takes 50 damage.

直衝鑽.name: Drill Run
直衝鑽.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

催眠曲.name: Sing
催眠曲.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

暗影爪.name: Shadow Claw
暗影爪.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

連環舔舔.name: Continuous Lick
連環舔舔.description: Flip coins until you get tails. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

迷魂拳.name: Dizzy Punch
迷魂拳.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

任意複製.name: Copy Anything
任意複製.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn't have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.

原始振翼.name: Primal Wing
原始振翼.description: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon back into their deck.

友情之環.name: Circle of Friends
友情之環.description: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

突擊.name: Assault
突擊.description: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

唱歌.name: Sing
唱歌.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
